pages.title: Pristine Essence Helmet
pages.text: The wearer can breathe underwater for an unlimited amount of time.

pages.title: Pristine Essence Chestplate
pages.text: Grants the wearer Regeneration and Fire Protection.$(br)$(br)Equipping the full Pristine Armor set allows the player to fly for an unlimited amount of time.

pages.title: Pristine Essence Leggings
pages.text: Constantly gives the wearer SPEED II and SPEED III while sprinting.
